response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value, especially considering its worth to you stands at $15,000. I understand your keen interest and appreciate your discerning taste. My proposal is to offer this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a price that reflects its immense value while allowing you to secure a significant saving compared to its market value. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 12000}
